pageProduct.name: Sukin Signature Micellar Cleansing Water 250ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

We LOVE our Signature Micellar Water- and so do you! It was voted the Best Micellar Water at the 2017 Beauty Heaven Best in Beauty Awards and there's no questioning why! Our Natural Signature Micellar Water is infused with gentle ingredients such as Aloe Vera which help to remove make-up and dirt build up, while soothing and purifying your base. Chamomile and Cucumber also calms the skin leaving it lightly hydrated and clean. And did we mention the calming vanilla scent? Like a dream. TIP: Micellar Water can be left on skin, there is no need to wash it off! However many like to double cleanse- where they use Micellar Water first to remove makeup, and then follow with a cleanser.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycerin, Decyl Glucoside, Lecithin, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract (Chamomile), Vanillin, Alcohol Denat., Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol

Directions

Soak a cotton pad or cloth and gently wipe over eyes and face. Can be left on or follow with Cleanser for a thorough cleanse
